Container.Name: Doods
Container.Overview: DOODS - Dedicated Open Object Detection Service. DOODS is a GRPC/REST service that detects objects in images. It's designed to be very easy to use, run as a container and available remotely.
Container.Description: DOODS - Dedicated Open Object Detection Service. DOODS is a GRPC/REST service that detects objects in images. It's designed to be very easy to use, run as a container and available remotely.
Container.DonateText: If you like my work please consider Donating.
